body:
Comment 1: 
This is working as intended. 

time.Sleep is defined as it will fire _after_ the duration passed to the function, so
technically this is not a bug.

Spinning inside goroutines is a known issue and you are advised not to do it.

It is trivial to demonstrate this effect in trivial programs, but is rarely an issue in
real life
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
